entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Those who grow up in the City States tend towards neutrality in all things.

entries.name: Size
entries: City State Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write High and Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: City State Intrigue
entries: Brought up in the political and diplomatic environs of your City State, you are a natural at knowing when someone is being deceptive and knowing how to decieve. You have proficiency in the {@skill Insight} and {@skill Deception} skills.
